DOC.brief_title: Bone Myoregulation Reflex & Presynaptic Ia Inhibition
DOC.detailed_description: Hypotheses study 1 . Bone myoregulation reflex ( BMR ) inhibit presynaptically T-reflex whole-body vibration ( WBV ) 2 . Cooling ankle abolishes inhibitor effect BMR soleus T-reflex Aim study test hypothesis . Methods : Participants : Ten young , healthy right hand dominant male adult volunteer include study . Procedure : Prior induction WBV , control T-reflex recording elicit participant complete 15-s trial WBV protocol familiarize procedure . Following control T-reflex recording , trial protocol 15-s rest , participant receive one session WBV . T-reflex record WBV . Then , cold pack apply right ankle 20 minute . T-reflex record cool ankle . Then , participant receive one session WBV , . T-reflex record WBV . A light ( 2.9 gr . ) triaxial ( x , z-axis ) accelerometer ( LIS344ALH , ECOPACK® ) tap right Achilles tendon z-axis perpendicular direction tendon ( Achilles accelerometer ) . A custom-made reflex hammer use tap right Achilles tendon caudal accelerometer . The intensity tap 19.6 N WBV frequencies 35 Hz deliver 60 s. The vibration plate WBV device ( Power-Plate®Pro5 , PowerPlate® International , Ltd. London , UK ) oscillate linear movement upward downward . The participant barefooted stand directly vibration platform . The surface electromyography ( SEMG ) data obtain participant stand upright vibration platform knees extension . The Ag/AgCl electrode ( KENDALL®Covidien ) disc radius 10 mm place 20 mm apart right soleus muscle belly shave skin accordance recommendation Surface ElectroMyoGraphy Non-Invasive Assessment Muscles ( SENIAM ) project . The recording T-reflex WBV-IMR acquire use SEMG . SEMG data record use PowerLAB® data acquisition system ( ADInstruments , Oxford , United Kingdom ) data analyze offline use LabChart7® ( ver 7.3.7 , ADInstruments , Oxford , United Kingdom ) software . Precautions voluntary muscle contraction motion artifact : 1. participant ask use handle WBV device secure balance . The sense balance may impair WBV . Therefore muscle may activate restore balance WBV , 2. WBV trial , participant ask relax make voluntary contraction low extremity muscle . 3. trial protocol apply familiarize vibration , 4. cable carefully tap skin minimize motion artifact , 5. EMG recording filter avoid WBV induce movement artifact use band pas filter 60 500 Hz .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Righthanded men Bone , muscle/tendon , joint , vascular , dermatologic disease low extremity spine Medication could affect musculoskeletal system Postural abnormality ( scoliosis , kyphosis , etc ) Systemic disease
